title: League randomly crashes on windows 10 while in-game
body:
A week ago my game started forcing my whole PC to shut down as if it had been turned off after the 3min mark while in game
i searched around but all of the solutions i find are either uninstall windows 10 or some minor stuff that didn't work

And disabling THE XBOX Game DVR nor the windows 7 compatibility didn't work either
i am asking for a way to fix this problem is it s driving me insane

(i can't recall to windows 8 or 7 because i bought this device with windows 10 installed)

replies.body: If your pc is shutting off out of nowhere without warning, there's a pretty good chance it's doing that because of overheating. Check [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#wq7) really quickly, for some precautions you can take, and if the first step I linked doesn't help make sure to go through the other steps as well. Let me know how that helps by testing it in a custom or practice match!

it worked on practice and custom games
(playing on windowed mode)
,but when i played a regular match-made game the device started crashing again???
